import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from '../css/shop.module.css' import firebase from '../config/Firebase' import Product from './Product' const Shop = () => { const [Loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [Products, setProducts] = useState(null) const db = firebase.firestore(); const storage = firebase.storage(); db.collection('products').get().then((result) => { setProducts(result.docs) setLoading(false) }) return (

) } export default Shop
